briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of GSK Biologicals' Seasonal Influenza Vaccine in Adults
officialTitle: Immunogenicity, Reactogenicity and Safety of GSK Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine FLU Q-QIV (GSK2282512A) When Administered Intramuscularly to Adults 18 Years of Age and Older

interventions.name: FluLavalTM-VB
otherNames: FluLavalTM containing the Victoria B flu strain

interventions.name: FluLavalTM-YB
otherNames: FluLavalTM containing the Yamagata B flu strain

summary:
This study is designed to test the immunogenicity and safety of an investigational influenza vaccine, in adults compared to two other influenza vaccines.

This study will also evaluate the lot-to-lot consistency of three vaccine lots.

primaryOutcome.measure: Titers for Serum Hemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Antibodies Against 4 Strains of Influenza Disease
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At Day 0 (D0) and at Day 21 (D21) post vaccination.
